name: contenthub-cms
description: A modern, full-featured Content Management System built with React, TypeScript, and Node.js

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install

author: Your Name
